医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现孕妇经常被排除在药物试验之外布朗大学公共卫生学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，孕妇经常被排除在安全性临床药物试验之外，这引发了人们对这些药物对孕产妇和儿童健康功效的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Pregnant-women-often-left-out-of-drug-trials-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Pregnant-women-often-left-out-of-drug-trials-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f0b6bbf-9762-4936-8bb0-0a0954704ab2 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 20:15:34 -0500 Pregnant women often left out of drug trials, study finds
研究揭示生物素具有减轻锰引起的脑损伤的潜力虽然锰是参与许多身体功能的必需矿物质，但缺乏和过量接触都会导致健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Study-reveals-biotine28099s-potential-to-mitigate-manganese-induced-brain-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Study-reveals-biotine28099s-potential-to-mitigate-manganese-induced-brain-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1225caa-d9f0-4cdc-b6f3-af1288064e1f Tue, 21 Jan 2025 20:10:42 -0500 Study reveals biotin’s potential to mitigate manganese-induced brain damage
英国研究人员概述了癌症疫苗进展战略英国肿瘤学研究人员齐聚一堂，撰写了第一份国家思想领导战略报告，介绍癌症疫苗的进展以及这些疫苗为癌症患者带来的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/UK-researchers-outline-strategy-for-cancer-vaccine-advancements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/UK-researchers-outline-strategy-for-cancer-vaccine-advancements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0b33266-cab9-4275-8f4c-723933a68890 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 20:06:20 -0500 UK researchers outline strategy for cancer vaccine advancements
研究揭示不孕症治疗患者的情绪和工作生活压力不孕不育是一个影响全球 8% 至 12% 育龄夫妇的问题——对于其中一些人来说，这个问题中断了他们的人生计划，即生孩子和建立家庭的愿望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Research-reveals-emotional-and-work-life-strain-in-infertility-treatment-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Research-reveals-emotional-and-work-life-strain-in-infertility-treatment-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bc46316-d904-4fa7-b360-5ab9eb818020 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 19:58:51 -0500 Research reveals emotional and work-life strain in infertility treatment patients
研究发现抗肿瘤 T 细胞中 KLRG1 和 PD-1 表达呈反相关2025年1月20日，Oncotarget第16卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“人类肿瘤CD8 T细胞中KLRG1和PD-1表达的反相关性”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Study-finds-anti-correlation-of-KLRG1-and-PD-1-expression-in-tumor-fighting-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Study-finds-anti-correlation-of-KLRG1-and-PD-1-expression-in-tumor-fighting-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ee3f6f0-28ed-4fa3-8c95-356f2d83a33a Tue, 21 Jan 2025 19:50:37 -0500 Study finds anti-correlation of KLRG1 and PD-1 expression in tumor fighting T cells
儿童肥胖治疗可降低长期健康风险，但不能降低抑郁症当肥胖儿童接受减肥治疗时，其效果会在以后的生活中产生影响，并且在他们成年后出现严重健康问题和过早死亡的风险会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Childhood-obesity-treatment-reduces-long-term-health-risks-but-not-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Childhood-obesity-treatment-reduces-long-term-health-risks-but-not-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb8fe741-90c7-4bdd-a4ce-7edb8b113d2c Tue, 21 Jan 2025 19:41:18 -0500 Childhood obesity treatment reduces long-term health risks but not depression
加州大学旧金山分校研究人员发现调节怀孕长度的分子计时器加州大学旧金山分校的研究人员发现了一种分子计时器，它在怀孕的第一天被激活，并影响小鼠的分娩时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/UCSF-researchers-discover-molecular-timer-that-regulates-pregnancy-length.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/UCSF-researchers-discover-molecular-timer-that-regulates-pregnancy-length.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77134b98-ce1a-47cb-87c0-f4f92bb3758f Tue, 21 Jan 2025 19:36:47 -0500 UCSF researchers discover molecular timer that regulates pregnancy length
坦桑尼亚宣布马尔堡病毒爆发，卡盖拉出现单例病例坦桑尼亚总统萨米亚·苏鲁胡·哈桑在与世界卫生组织总干事谭德塞会面后宣布爆发马尔堡病毒，并确认西北地区卡盖拉出现一例病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Tanzanias-announces-Marburg-virus-outbreak-with-single-case-in-Kagera.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Tanzanias-announces-Marburg-virus-outbreak-with-single-case-in-Kagera.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=227a099d-a173-4c9d-a815-bfd9623ff0b8 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 19:29:44 -0500 Tanzania's announces Marburg virus outbreak with single case in Kagera
短期抗生素可以改变治疗呼吸机相关肺炎的游戏规则抗生素过度使用是抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 上升的一个关键驱动因素，而抗菌素耐药性是一项全球重大健康危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Short-course-antibiotics-can-be-a-game-changer-in-tackling-ventilator-induced-pneumonia-Antibiotic-Overuse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Short-course-antibiotics-can-be-a-game-changer-in-tackling-ventilator-induced-pneumonia-Antibiotic-Overuse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51de7fb7-df79-4495-a018-51606f6a5a74 Tue, 21 Jan 2025 19:25:00 -0500 Short-course antibiotics can be a game-changer in tackling ventilator-associated pneumonia
研究揭示小胶质细胞对损伤反应的性别差异发生碰撞。有人受伤，头部受伤，脑震荡。就在第一批响应人员到达帮助该人时，在大脑内部，另一组响应人员正在忙着清除碎片并修复受伤的组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Research-reveals-sex-differences-in-microglia-response-to-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250121/Research-reveals-sex-differences-in-microglia-response-to-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=486f7bef-f734-4875-a72c-e5491af74edf Tue, 21 Jan 2025 19:19:54 -0500 Research reveals sex differences in microglia response to injury
